summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GCE Campus Transportation System - all core functionality working correctly

integration_issues.issue: Location permission required for service selection popup - expected behavior for geolocation features
integration_issues.note: This is expected behavior as the app requires location for ETA calculations

passed_tests: Admin login with default credentials (admin@gceits.com / Admin@12345)
Admin dashboard loads with correct stats display
Admin can add new bus vehicle via API
Admin can add new ambulance vehicle via API
Admin can view registered vehicles list
Driver login for bus and ambulance drivers
Public map view displays bus/ambulance status correctly
GPS mock endpoint receives and processes location data
RFID scan endpoint detects speed violations correctly
All navigation between admin pages works

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (18/19 UI tests passed - 1 expected geolocation behavior)
